resources.string: COVID-19\nLock-down advice
Welcome to the COVID-19 Lock-down advice app
Together, we\'ll get Corona under control.
Join me in stopping the spread of COVID-19! Download COVID-19 App. Go to: https://www.rivm.nl/en
Share this app
Ask your friends and family to help
Report my condition, even if you\'re well
Monitor
Infected
Help
If you are invested with COVID-19, please let us know.
By sharing your status we can inform the individuals you\'ve recently been in contact with. Please note that don\'t know who you are and will therefore never be able to share your identity.
Next
Please enter your pin

By uploading you agree to share your bluetooth proximity of the last 21 days with Ministerie van Volksgezondheid, Welzijn en Sport. We do not collect any geolocation or personally identifiable information.

Uploading your data to start contact tracing

We\'ll inform the individuals you\'ve recently been in contact with to avoid the Coronavirus from spreading.
OK
Welcome to the Coronavirus COVID-19 Lockdown App
A tool to reduce the spread of infectious diseases like COVID-19 through social distancing.
Your data is private and we only use non personal information
We need you to reduce the spread of the Coronavirus. Please accept and agree to the following.
You agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
You agree to receive push notifications. We might use this to inform you when you\'ve been in contact with someone who is infected.
You agree to track your Bluetooth data without tacking your location.
Next
How can we help you?
About the virus
What can I do to avoid further spread of the virus?

Stay at home as much as possible, ensure good hygiene practice and only go outside if it is really necessary. Keep 1.5 meters distance (2 arm lengths) from others, keeping a distance of 1.5 metres reduces the chance of people infecting each other.
I have other questions about the virus
Please check the official website or call 0800- 1351
About this application
How does this app help the spread of the Virus?
The application supports source and contract tracing for COVID-19 and provices remote support where needed. We\'re able to monitor the outbreak more closely and provide intensive care where needed.
Why do I have to selfmonitor?
We get a better picture of how you feel and can better guide you remotely. We are able to provide you with the correct information and provide more intensive care if needed.
Do I have to be worried about my Privacy?

No, your data is yours. We don\'t know who you are. Bluetooth helps us to identify who you have been in contact with. This data is only used if you are tested positive for COVID-19. Even then, we will not be able to identify you.
Our response to the Virus
What is an Intelligent Lockdown?
What are the latest stats?
How do you feel today?
I\'m feeling good
I\'m not feeling quite right
Okay, great!
Let\'s find out more how you\'re feeling
Yes
No
All fields are mandatory
Advice to keep you safe and sound
Take a minute each day and track how you\'re feeling.
Stay at home as much as possible and only go outside if it is really necessary to avoid further spread of the virus. For more information please visit: https://www.rivm.nl/en
Done
Please fill in the form. We\'ll be able to get a better understanding of your symptoms
What do I do?
Stay home. Make sure you feel better.
Don\'t go shopping or have visitors
Ask others to go shopping for you or deliver at home. Ask if someone else can walk the dog.
You\'re experiencing potential symptoms of the Virus. Here are some tips:
What do my housemates do?
For household members without symptoms the same rules apply for everyone in the Netherlands.
If you haven\'t had any symptoms for more than 24 hours, you can go back outside.
When do I call my GP?

There is no need to worry at this point. Keep track of your symptoms daily. You call the doctor if you get sicker or if you need medical help, for example if you get a fever or if you experience unusual shortness of breath.
Please do not visit your GP or local hospital, call your GP first.
Advice when you\'re mild experiencing symptoms
You\'re experiencing symptoms of the Virus. Here are some tips:
If you have housemates, they can also not go outside.
If no one had any symptoms for more than 24 hours, you can go back outside.
Thanks for sharing your details with us. We\'ll get back to you ASAP.

We\'ll get in touch with you ASAP. If in the meantime you need medical help, please call your GP.
